lakehouse_information.lakehouse_id: Put your lakehouse id here. Metada will be stored here

workspace_information.workspace_id: Put the workspace-id of which the solutions resides in here.

secret_information.vault_name: The name of your Azure Key Vault containing information about the registered app
secret_information.secret_name_for_tenant_id: Name of the secret storing the tenant-id
secret_information.secret_name_for_client_id: Name of the secret storing the app client-id
secret_information.secret_name_for_secret_key: Name of the secret storing the app secret key
